title: Heart of a stallion
creator_credit: Lew Landers, Carl Laemmle, Universal Pictures and Castle Films
brief_description: Excerpts from the 1935 feature film “Stormy” starring Noah Beery and Jean Rogers. Stormy (Noah Beery) goes in search of a lost horse - a victim of a train wreck. His search leads him into mountainous country where he encounters rustlers who plan to slaughter a whole herd of horses.
